articles.author: Sue Dunlevy
articles.title: The weird COVID-19 side effect worrying doctors - News Mail
articles.description: Young healthy people in their 30s and 40s are suffering deadly strokes after mild cases of COVID-19.
articles.content:
Young healthy people in their 30s and 40s are suffering deadly strokes after mild cases of COVID-19 and it's emerging as one of many life-threatening complications of the virus.
The main risk was thought to be lung problems but coronavirus is now also being … [+3952 chars]

articles.title: UK 'worried' about virus-linked illness in kids - Coffs Coast Advocate
articles.description: Health officials in UK have cautioned doctors about a potential new coronavirus-related syndrome emerging in children, as more than two million Australians download the COVID-19 tracing app.
articles.content: British health authorities have reportedly warned doctors over an emerging number of children with a "multi-system inflammatory state" that could be linked to the coronavirus, while reassuring people any difficulties related to COVID-19 for children appeared … [+14635 chars]

articles.description: Coronavirus: US records 2494 deaths in 24 hours after predicted ‘peak’
